history.text: Adopted the Mohican Judiciary Act containing revised Court Code, revised General Citation Ordinance, and the Stockbridge-Munsee Bill of Rights. Mohican Judiciary Act forwarded to BIA for their review and approval on December 15, 1995. Comments from BIA on July 5, 1996.

annotations.annotation: On November 7, 1995, the Tribal Council through Resolution No. 1551-95 adopted the Mohican Judiciary Act, which included the Stockbridge-Munsee Bill of Rights, revisions to the Court Code, and revisions to the General Citation Ordinance. Mohican Judiciary Act forwarded to BIA for their review and approval on December 15, 1995. Comments from BIA on July 5, 1996. Approval letter from BIA on July 18, 1996.
